benchmark_details.name: DATASET RESEARCH
benchmark_details.overview: DATASET RESEARCH is the first comprehensive benchmark evaluating AI agentsâ€™ ability to discover and synthesize datasets from 208 real-world demands across knowledge-intensive and reasoning-intensive tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of the benchmark is to evaluate AI agents' capabilities in demand-driven dataset discovery and synthesis.

data.annotation: Automated metadata generation and human verification

methodology.calculation: Normalized scores are calculated based on the reference dataset performance.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect the quality of discovered datasets against reference datasets.
methodology.baseline_results: Top fine-tuning score of 22% on difficult DatasetResearch-pro subset.
methodology.validation: Performance evaluated through real-world tasks and comparisons with baseline agents.
